[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/single_entry/mod.rs] [Migration] [Enum extension] Can new SingleEntryKey variants be added safely, or do they require database migration? (Medium)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [Access control] [Direct DB access] Can external code bypass schema abstractions and directly manipulate the underlying RocksDB? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [Access control] [Schema visibility] Does the pub visibility of schema structs allow unauthorized crates to access consensus data? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/single_entry/mod.rs] [Access control] [LastVote protection] Is LastVote data properly protected from unauthorized reads that could leak validator voting strategy? (Low)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/block/mod.rs] [Cryptography] [Hash function] What hash function is used for HashValue, and is it cryptographically secure against modern attacks? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/quorum_certificate/mod.rs] [Cryptography] [Hash domain separation] Are block hashes and QC hashes properly domain-separated to prevent cross-protocol attacks? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Cryptography] [Node hash] How are DAG node hashes computed, and can hash grinding find favorable hashes? (Medium)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [Consistency] [Block-QC binding] Is it enforced that every QC corresponds to an existing block, or can dangling QCs exist? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [Consistency] [Vote-Node binding] Does every vote reference a valid node, or can orphaned votes pollute the database? (Medium)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [Consistency] [Certified-Node binding] Does every certified node have a corresponding base node in NodeSchema? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/single_entry/mod.rs] [Consistency] [LastVote validity] Is LastVote data validated to reference an existing block before being persisted? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [Atomicity] [Batch writes] Are multi-schema batch writes atomic, or can partial commits leave inconsistent state? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [Atomicity] [Rollback safety] If a batch write fails, is rollback complete or can partial data remain in the database? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [Atomicity] [Delete operations] Are batch deletes atomic across multiple schemas, or can some entries remain orphaned? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [RocksDB] [Compaction] Can compaction operations corrupt schema data or cause temporary unavailability? (Medium)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [RocksDB] [WAL corruption] What happens if the Write-Ahead Log is corrupted - can validators recover consensus state? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [RocksDB] [Snapshot isolation] Do read operations use proper snapshot isolation, or can they see partial writes? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [RocksDB] [Options safety] Are RocksDB options (create_if_missing, create_missing_column_families) secure, or can they mask errors? (Medium)
